item.title: Intel To Use Both Family 18 And Family 19 Identification For Upcoming CPUs
item.description: Intel processors have long identified in the Family 6 series going back to the 1990s but over the past number of months Intel engineers have been adapting the Linux kernel to prepare for a post Family 6 Intel CPU era for the model/family CPU identification handling.
